item.title: Day 1: Devil’s Corner
item.description: We flew from Sydney to Hobart on Qantas QF1583 and this is the first time we have flown domestic in a few years. I liked using the automatic bag check in system that automatically recognises the bag based on the Qantas smart luggage tag was great (even though I had some difficulty using it). There was no on-board entertainment system, so I watched a movie on the iPad (Walter Mitty – one of my favourite films).
